version_description: - Bug fixes and enhancements.

• iOS 8 share extension support. Users on iOS 8 and above can now share articles to any app that supports share extensions, not just Facebook, Twitter and email. The format of sharing emails has also been simplified, allowing them to be edited more easily.

• Password manager support. Users with 1Password or LastPass installed can now log into their Economist account without typing their email address and password.

• Various other bug fixes and improvements.
• Bug fixes and improvements.

- Fixed an issue where opening the app would stop audio playback
- Other bug fixes

- Fixed an issue where opening the app would stop audio playback
- Other bug fixes

- Support for 3D Touch on the iPhone 6s and 6s Plus with Quick Actions and Peek and Pop. Press the Home screen icon to access various Quick Actions. Lightly press an article in the table of contents to preview it, and press more firmly to open it.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
enhancements and performance improvements

* Fixed a bug where the app would forget your place the next time you opened it.
* Fixed a bug where zoomed images would not change orientation when the device was rotated.
* Various other bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

This update fixes a critical bug where audio would not play when the app was in the background.
Apologies for the inconvenience that this has caused.
Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This is a major update, in which the app has been moved on to a new technical platform. This has allowed us to add:

* Search. You can now search within a particular issue.
* Streaming audio. Audio is now streamed when you press play, and you don’t have to wait for it to download fully.
* Improved downloads. A new download service means downloads are less likely to fail.
* Look and feel. Fonts and style have been updated.

Because of moving to a new platform, the following will be lost when updating:

* Bookmarks. Bookmarks will not be retained when updating the app.
* Downloaded issues. Issues downloaded with the old version are not compatible with the new version of the app. These will need to be re-downloaded after the app is updated.
* Apple Watch. The Apple Watch app has been removed.
Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Changes to analytics system.

- Added support for The World in 2018
- App should remember your place more frequently
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements

- Restored the option to increase and decrease the playback speed of audio
- iPhone X support
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements (especially in the audio player)
- Fix for an issue where the latest edition was deleted when the device was somewhat low on disk space
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Changes to registration page.
- Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements
Small bugs and accessibility improvements.

• Added introductory pricing
• We hope to have fixed an issue where night mode and text size settings were not preserved across page swipes. Please let us know if you still experience this problem
Small bugs and accessibility improvements.
- Jump straight to your favourite sections using our new section navigation button
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
Keep track of what you've read with article tick marks

- Keep track of what you've read with article tick marks
- Minor bug fixes & Improvements
- Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements
- Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements
- Minor bug fixes & performance enhancements

Audio Content
At The Economist, we’re prioritising the health and well-being of our staff which means there will be delay in publishing the audio edition to the app and website. We expect the audio content to be published, at the latest, by 10pm UK Time on Thursdays.

For more information, please see our regularly updated FAQs for COVID-19 in settings, FAQ
We’ve updated the audio player to help you quickly add and play the articles you’re interested in.
We’ve updated the audio player to help you quickly add and play the articles you’re interested in.
Audio player improvements following customer feedback.
